thumb.title: 【ARC】MORTAL KOMBAT - JOHNNY CAGE
thumb.description: 真人快打モータルコンバットMortal Kombat T-Unit Rev.5.0.0(1992, MIDWAY)Character - Johnny Cage難易度・★★★★★ (Lvl.5, Hardest)Non-Tool Assisted Run1 Coin Credit, No Matches Lost===00:00 Arcade Attract Intro00:07 Character Select (Johnny Cage)00:16 Sub-Zero (Bi Han)00:58 Scorpion (Hanzo Hasashi)01:43 Sonya Blade02:19 Test Your Might - Wood02:29 Kano03:06 Raiden03:48 Liu Kang04:28 Test Your Might - Stone04:38 Johnny Cage (Mirror Match)05:17 Endurance I (Sub-Zero, Sonya)06:23 Endurance II (Kano, Scorpion)07:25 Test Your Might - Steel07:36 Endurance III (Kano, Raiden)08:36 Goro09:14 Shang Tsung (Final Stage)09:59 Ending & Credits12:17 Thanks For Watching!======ご視聴感謝するThanks For Watching!
